test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection of RPLMN, HPLMN/EHPLMN, UPLMN and OPLMN / Automatic mode
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.1 or TC 6.1.1.1b shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection / Automatic mode / between FDD and TDD
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA FDD and E-UTRA TDD

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection of RPLMN, HPLMN/EHPLMN, UPLMN and OPLMN / Automatic mode / Single Frequency operation
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA. This test is 'cells on single frequency only' equivalent of TC 6.1.1.1
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.1 or TC 6.1.1.1b shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection of "Other PLMN/access technology combinations" / Automatic mode
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.2 or TC 6.1.1.2a shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection of "Other PLMN/access technology combinations" / Automatic mode / Single Frequency operation
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA This test is 'cells on single frequency only' equivalent of 6.1.1.2
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.2 or TC 6.1.1.2a shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: Cell reselection of ePLMN in manual mode
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA and (( NOT Category M1) OR (Category M1 AND (intra-frequency RSRQ measurements and inter-frequency RSRP and RSRQ measurements in RRC_CONNECTED)))
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.3 or TC 6.1.1.3b shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: Cell reselection of ePLMN in manual mode / between FDD and TDD
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA FDD and E-UTRA TDD and ((NOT Category M1) OR (Category M1 AND (intra-frequency RSRQ measurements and inter-frequency RSRP and RSRQ measurements in RRC_CONNECTED)))

test_cases.TC Title: Cell reselection of ePLMN in manual mode / Single Frequency operation
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA. This test is 'cells on single frequency only' equivalent of 6.1.1.3
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.3 or TC 6.1.1.3b shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection in shared network environment / Automatic mode
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection in shared network environment / Automatic mode / Between FDD and TDD
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA FDD and E-UTRA TDD and ((NOT Category M1) OR (Category M1 AND (intra-frequency RSRQ measurements and inter-frequency RSRP and RSRQ measurements in RRC_CONNECTED)))

test_cases.TC Title: Void
PLMN selection of RPLMN, HPLMN/EHPLMN, UPLMN and OPLMN / Automatic mode / User reselection
test_cases.Applicability Comment: UEs supporting E-UTRA and user initiated PLMN reselection in automatic mode and ((NOT Category M1) OR (Category M1 AND (intra-frequency RSRQ measurements and inter-frequency RSRP and RSRQ measurements in RRC_CONNECTED)))
test_cases.Number of TC Executions: Either TC 6.1.1.6 or TC 6.1.1.6a shall be executed. (Note 4)

test_cases.TC Title: PLMN selection of RPLMN, HPLMN/EHPLMN, UPLMN and OPLMN / Automatic mode / User reselection / Single Frequency operation
